meanings.definition: A dark substance applied under the eyes to reduce glare.
meanings.sent1: The baseball player applied eyeblack to prevent the sun's reflection.
meanings.sent2: She wore eyeblack during the game to help her see better.
meanings.sent3: The soccer player accidentally drew a smiley face with the eyeblack.
meanings.sent4: The eyeblack acted like a shield against the blinding sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The eyeblack made his eyes look fierce and determined.

meanings.definition: A cosmetic product used by athletes to reduce sun glare.
meanings.sent1: The football player always carries eyeblack in his bag.
meanings.sent2: The swimmer applied eyeblack before the race to avoid glare.
meanings.sent3: The basketball player joked that he could use eyeblack as face paint.
meanings.sent4: Her eyeblack was like a secret weapon against the bright sun.
meanings.sent5: The eyeblack made her feel ready to take on any challenge.
